# Interactive graph

<style>
  * {
    font-family: sans-serif;
    body {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      display: flex;
      justify-content: center;
      align-items: center;
      flex-direction: column;
      height: 100vh;
    }
    #input-container {
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    #bmi-chart-container {
      position: relative;
      width: 600px;
      height: 100px
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }
    #bmi-indicator {
      height: 30px;
      width: 30px;
      border-radius: 50%;
      position: relative;
      z-index: 10;
      text-align: center;
      line-height: 30px;
      background-color: grey;
      left: 0;
      transform: translate(-50%, 30px);
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      color: black;
      font-weight: bold; 
      font-size: 14px;
}
    }

    .bmi-label {
      position: absolute;
      bottom: 0px;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
      text-align: center;
    }
    
    input[type="number"], button {
      margin: 5px;
      padding: 10px;
      font-size: 1em;
    }
    
    button {
      cursor: pointer;
    }
  }
</style> 

<div id="plot">
</div>

<h4>BMI Calculator</h4>
<input type="number" id="weight" placeholder="Weight (lb)">
<input type="number" id="height" placeholder="Height (in)">
<button onclick="updateBMI()">Calculate BMI</button>

<svg id="bmi-chart"></svg>
<div id="bmi-indicator"></div>

<div id="bmi-chart-container">
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7"></script>
<script src="scripts/myscript.js"></script>
